TextLibrary.Text: Nice shooting, kid. That mining ship you hit is one of two that's been bothering us.
Nice shooting, kid. That mining ship you hit is one of two that's been bothering us.
I guess you need me to find the other one?
I guess you need me to find the other one?
We already know where it is... it's on Erebus II. We just need you to take it out.
We already know where it is... it's on Erebus II. We just need you to take it out.
I graduate top of my class just to shoot down Pirates in mining ships... great...
I graduate top of my class just to shoot down Pirates in mining ships... great...
Hey! It might be like shooting fish in a barrel to you, but these Pirates are a real problem for us. We don't all get top-of-the-line MRI ships like you!
Hey! It might be like shooting fish in a barrel to you, but these Pirates are a real problem for us. We don't all get top-of-the-line MRI ships like you!
Never mind. The quicker I'm done here, the quicker I get back to Serpens Prime.
Never mind. The quicker I'm done here, the quicker I get back to Serpens Prime.
